DOC.brief_title: SCRIPPS V : Intracoronary Brachytherapy Recurrent Restenosis After Multiple Drug-Eluting Stents
DOC.detailed_description: This investigator-initiated protocol examine effectiveness intracoronary brachytherapy use Novoste beta-emitting catheter recurrent stenosis treatment multiple drug-eluting stent . While intracoronary brachytherapy use purpose clinician time , data support clinical decision-making lacking . Currently , cardiologists find restenosis implant drug-eluting stent , often place stent elutes different drug within stent . If patient present restenosis segment already treat sirolimus paclitaxel-eluting stent , option limit . Intracoronary brachytherapy often use scenario , efficacy approach well study . The investigator recently review clinical outcome five patient underwent intracoronary radiation drug-eluting stent . They discover one episode target vessel revascularization episode stent thrombosis . While sample small , investigator believe prospective study provide important information regard approach .
